Uses of Class
com.jme.bullet.animation.PhysicsLink

  • Packages that use PhysicsLink 
    Package Description
    com.jme.bullet.animation
    A dynamic animation control and some associated classes.

    • Uses of PhysicsLink in com.jme.bullet.animation

      Subclasses of PhysicsLink in com.jme.bullet.animation 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BoneLink
      Link an animated bone in a skeleton to a jointed rigid body in a ragdoll.
      class  TorsoLink
      Link the torso of an animated model to a rigid body in a ragdoll.
